thread.title: Garfield's Alphonso Anderson commits to Montana

title: Garfield's Alphonso Anderson commits to Montana
text:
Garfield's Alphonso Anderson commits to Montana Garfield wing Alphonso Anderson announced his verbal commitment to Montana. Post to Facebook Garfield's Alphonso Anderson commits to Montana Garfield wing Alphonso Anderson announced his verbal commitment to Montana.   KING5.com: http://www.king5.com/story/sports/high-school/2015/10/12/garfields-alphonso-anderson-commits-montana/73821150/   Join the Conversation To   Garfield's Alphonso Anderson commits to Montana Allison Thomasseau, KING 5 Sports 10:37 a.m. PDT October 12, 2015 Garfield wing Alfonso Anderson at the free-throw line during the 2014 state basketball tournament. (Photo: Allison Thomasseau) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Garfield wing Alphonso Anderson announced on Instagram that he is verbally committed to Montana. 
Anderson, who also held an offer from Boise State, announced his decision Saturday. He's listed as a three-star recruit on Scout and Rivals, and a two-star recruit on ESPN. 
Anderson's decision was extra special, as he committed on his 18th birthday. 
After playing his first two years at Wilson, Anderson transferred to Garfield last season. The 6-foot-6 senior helped Garfield to a Class 3A state title last year, scoring 17 points and grabbing 14 rebounds in the title game. A strong defensive player, Garfield coach Ed Haskins called Anderson the best post in the state, even though it is not technically his position. Garfield beats Beach for 3A hoops title 
Last season Anderson was Garfield's lead rebounder and second in scoring. He averaged 16.6 points, 10.3 rebounds, 1.6 assists, and 1.1 steals in 29 games. Check out his highlights from last season here . A photo posted by Alphonso Anderson (@fonzo_10) on Oct 11, 2015 at 12:02am PDT Read or Share this story: http://www.king5.com/story/sports/high-school/2015/10/12/garfields-alphonso-anderson-commits-montana/73821150/ TOP VIDEOS
